basic.description: This course analyzes the tissues, cells, and molecules of the immune system and their relationships to disease and transplantation.
basic.subject: PCB
basic.title: Immunology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L; also CHM 2210, PCB 3063, PCB 3134, or instructor permission.
